answers.answer: A negative brain MRI and neck MRA would rule out many of the major causes that can lead to your symptoms.If balance is an issue, you can check the vitamin B12 level in the blood, as well as a referral to an ENT physician to rule out inner ear causes.I agree with the neurology referral at this time.  Nerve conduction studies can be done to see if there is peripheral nerve damage.  Further blood studies looking for diabetes or thyroid dysfunction can also be considered.These options can be discussed with your personal physician, or in conjunction with the neurologist.Followup with your personal physician is essential.This answer is not intended as and does not substitute for medical advice - the information presented is for patient education only. Please see your personal physician for further evaluation of your individual case.Kevin, M.D.kevinmd_

Thanks for the reply. I failed to mention that I also get numbing feelings around my right eye, this is the usual side I would get a migrane but no pain. I'm also  getting aching in Left side of neck.My bloods were done two weeks ago, glucose was noral as well as everything else, my thyroid was only slighlty elevated so that was discounted and my esr was 17. What do you feel might be going on should I be concerned about MS with a negative MRI?, and should I be concerned about SLE, my WBC count is always normal or slightly elevated so I thought not in the first instance. I also forgot to say that I have been having like a lump at the back of the throat sensation no difficulty in swallowing just the sensation, I've also getting a sore feeling throat and a bit hoarse but this comes and goes. I would appreciate your comments. Many Thanks ...

question: I am 38yrs old female. Four mnths post natal. I had a bad time in pregnancy lots of heartburn/indigestion/headaches constantly from 30wks, hypertension and oedema with flu like symptoms especially with my ears feeling full,dull and painful.Hypertension has improved now off labetalol. I was induced at 38wks,3.5 hr labour felt very shocked on entenox in last 30 mins,very shaky after.Have felt ok but had some neck and thoracic pain so went to see an osteopath who manipulated thoracic area, approx 4hrs later had severe symptoms hot sensation in neck, muscle or nerve tightening in face, jaw and neck.Went to emergency room Xrays normal, ?muscle spasm, but this has not resolved.Since then I've had an MRI w/o contrast to rule out MS which was  normal. But my symptoms are unchanged and I have the same facial feelings with occasional numbness of the nose and cheeks.Burning sensation occasionally in hands and feet,slight headache(I do get occ migranes with aura)numbness in back of hands little finger and ring finger intermittant in both hands??ulna nerve compression. But am also getting sleep disturbance and strange thoughts,shaky feeling in my head day and night.My balance feels unstable but not falling over and neouro examinations have been normal.Now also sinus pain, feels like fluid in my ear,and a crackling sensation I can hear.Due to see a neurologist, but am worried as I feel worse as the day goes on.Am medical but am thinking of so many things its really making me panic.Any thoughts as to what this is.Many Thanks..
title: sensory/neuro symptoms/ent??
